Name

{{ name }}

Email

{{ email }}

Phone

{{ phone }}

Password

*****************

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', templateUrl: './profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profile.component.scss'] }) export class ProfileComponent implements OnInit { edit: boolean = false; bgColor: any = '#f0ad4e'; name:any; email:any; phone:any; password:any; user:any ={ name: '', email: '', phone: '', password: '', } constructor(){ } ngOnInit(){ this.checkUser(); } editProfile() { this.edit = !this.edit; this.user.name = this.name; this.user.email = this.email; this.user.phone = this.phone; this.user.password = this.password; if (!this.edit) { this.bgColor = '#f0ad4e'; console.log("Updated"); // Write Profile Update Code Here } else { console.log("Not"); this.bgColor = '#28a745'; } } checkUser(){ let user:any = localStorage.getItem("user"); let verifyUser = user && JSON.parse(user); if(verifyUser){ this.name = verifyUser.data.name; this.email = verifyUser.data.email; this.phone = verifyUser.data.phone; this.password = verifyUser.data.password; } } }
